name: 2D and 3D Godot: Game 01
description:
"Game 01" is the first educational video game from the "2D and 3D Godot development" project.  The game is playable, with 2D-oriented graphics and few playable elements.

Gameplay so far. Get as many points by hitting bricks with a game ball.

Use arrow keyboard keys and mouse for playing:

Game start - click with LMB on the "PLAY" button arrow key UP - moving up arrow key DOWN - moving down arrow key LEFT - moving left arrow key RIGHT - moving right

 Students or developers interested can download project files for a price defined and create their own game project.

Enjoy playing!
